item.title: NFL looks into Ravens for Lamar practice status

item.title: Indiana reasserts 'will' with 50-point rout of UCLA
item.description: Indiana pulled off a rare Power 4 conference feat with a 50-point blowout win over UCLA on Saturday.

item.title: Fueled by loss to UGA, Ole Miss flips script vs. OU
item.description: Still stung by last week's fourth-quarter collapse against Georgia, Ole Miss finished strong and rallied to a 34-26 win over Oklahoma.
